question:
Which of the following brought the whole of Orissa, Cooch Bihar, and parts of east Bengal, including Dacca, under the
Mughal rule in 1592?
explanation: The Mughal mansabdar Raja Man Singh brought the whole of Orissa, Cooch Bihar, and parts of east Bengal, including Dacca, under the Mughal rule in 1592 A.D. The foster brother of Akbar, Mirza Aziz Koka, conquered Kathiawar in the west.
